name: Trivia Troll U
description:
Trivia Troll University's curriculum consists of ten academic subjects, each of which consists of ten jigsaw puzzles which are appropriate for the subject matter. Your "assignment" is to answer multiple-choice and true-false questions to earn the pieces of the puzzles. Your next challenge is to assemble the puzzle not knowing what the picture is. When the puzzle is complete you'll see a brief description of the picture.

You'll also have the opportunity to create and join groups (e.g., homeschool groups, families, school classes, etc.) for friendly competition.

TTU subjects include American History, Animals & Nature, Art & Literature, Bible, Geography, Music & Theater, Politics & Civics, Science & Math, Technology, and World History.
